EmailTemplate.subject: Your BlueWave Community Solar Account is Past Due
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.Name},
COVID-19 Information: We recognize that the unprecedented COVID-19 situation may be causing financial difficulty. Please contact our Customer Care team if you have concerns about making payments for your BlueWave Community Solar subscription. Please disregard this notification if you've already sent a check by mail. BlueWave employees are all working remotely, which is causing brief delays in processing check payments.
Your BlueWave account is a week past due.
Your outstanding account balance is {!Account.Total_Outstanding_Balance_Merge__c}.
Please make a payment as soon as possible.
To check the status of your account and make a payment online, please login to your BlueWave Portal. You can also access your portal at bluewavesolar.com.
Log Into Your Portal Here
Thanks for being part of the Wave, we're happy you're here.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
